title: France to close schools, ban domestic travel as virus surges
content:
1. France to close schools, ban domestic travel as virus surges  Associated Press
  2. Schools in France to close under third lockdown - BBC News  BBC News
  3. France risks 'losing control' over Covid-19 spread without stricter national measures -- Macron  CNN
  4. OPINION: Macron was right to delay a third French lockdown, but would be wrong to avoid one now  The Local France
  5. French economy braces for third national lockdown  FRANCE 24 English
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
